Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your daily routine. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your life. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you with an offer of $200. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also the value we place on making it accessible to someone who appreciates its benefits. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
